description:
Hi,
Instance Console won't accept backspace, arrow, delete or enter keystrokes. Latest Openstack, Tested on IE, Chrome and FF.
PS I am totally new to OpenStack so just starting out learning it.
Thanks

OpenStack release v16.0.0
IOnstalled using https://docs.openstack.org/developer/devstack/
title: Backspace and enter not working in Instance Console
